title: Evil values
author: VD
content_html:
I stumbled across this quote just in time to add it to the paperback edition of CORPORATE CANCER.

Remember, you can’t spell DEVIL without Diversity and Inclusivity. And you can’t spell EVIL without Equality and Inclusivity.
content_text:
